casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America v. Abbott M. FOX, Temporary Trustee of Bergland Lumber Company. No. 8669. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. June 5, 1940. Joseph F. Deeb, of Grand Rapids, Mich., for appellant; Buildey, Ledyard, Dickinson & Wright, of Detroit, Mich., for appellee.

Before HICKS, SIMONS, and ALLEN,. Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Pursuant to agreement of counsel, it is ordered that this appeal be and the same is docketed and dismissed, the costs to be charged against the Government as constructive earnings.
